title: Central Angle Calculator: From Arc, Chord, Sector Area & Radius | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: From arc length L and radius r: \(\theta = \frac{L}{r}\) (radians) From chord length c and radius r: \(\theta = 2 \arcsin\left(\frac{c}{2r}\right)\) From sector area A and radius r: \(\theta = \frac{2A}{r^2}\) Degrees ↔ radians: \(\theta_{\text{deg}} = \theta_{\text{rad}} \cdot \frac{180}{\pi}\), \(\theta_{\text{rad}} = \theta_{\text{deg}} \cdot \frac{\pi}{180}\)
